title: Hannathon
content:
HANNATHON

Northern border town of Zebulun (Jos 19:14), mentioned in the Amarna tablets (c. 1370 BC) and in the annals of Tiglath-pileser III (745–727 BC). Not yet precisely located, it has been identified with Kefr ‘Anau near Rimmon and with Tell el-Bedeiwiyah, north of Nazareth.
